Name: 星の欠片の物語。しかけ版
About the game: ■：Early purchase bonus 　The following items will be available for download as digital benefits for approximately one month after release (scheduled through February 26, 2023). 　Installed at 　Tale of the Fragmented Star_ Four Puzzling Pieces - Limited-Time Bonuses 　folder of your installation. *Please note: After the expiration date has passed, you will not be able to re-download the files. 　Please move it to another location beforehand . １：Making of 'Tale of the Fragmented Star: Four Puzzling Pieces' Story of production process and setting tips. ２：Script audio data of 'Tale of the Fragmented Star: Four Puzzling Pieces' App you can enjoy script and audio with communication by Ms. Rika Abe as a voice actor. ３：Theme of 'Tale of the Fragmented Star: Four Puzzling Pieces' Wall paper VR-specific Communication Puzzle Game Made for VR from the very foundations. ※ Notes The game begins by wearing HMD. Story A lone girl stands abandoned on a broken star. With the star deprived of its power, she can neither use it to escape nor inform others of her plight. However, there exists a point on this star that intersects with another world. The player, by standing on this convergence point and wearing the Otherworld-Viewing Device (VR unit), can enter the parallel world and communicate with the girl. Together, they cooperate to solve the puzzle of restoring the star's power so she may be able to leave. Character Game Concept Although sight is highly intuitive in VR, the same cannot be said for most other aspects, leading to irritation from clumsy controls. We designed this game around directing a character through glances to circumvent this and change that annoyance into a game element. How to play. Match the red dot in the center of the screen to the object you are interested in, and its outline will be circled. The girl will then examine and move the object for the player. Through trial and error, you can solve the mystery and lead the girl to escape from the planet. Operation. 　Can be played with HMD only, no controller.
